Title: Relates to the use of virtual credit cards by insurers and certain health care plans and the effectiveness of provisions of law relating thereto
Summary: Relates to the use of virtual credit cards by insurers and certain health care plans and the effectiveness of provisions of law relating thereto.
LawCode: Amd §§3217-b & 4325, Ins L; amd §4406-c, Pub Health L; amd §4, Chap of 2025 (as proposed in S.2105-A & A.3986-A)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law and the public health law, in relation to the use of virtual credit cards by insurers and certain health care plans; and to amend a chapter of the laws of 2025 amending the insurance law and the public health law relating to the use of virtual credit cards by insurers and certain health care plans, as proposed in legislative bills numbers S. 2105-A and A. 3986-A, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
